text: jo log hamaaree aayaton mein her pher paida karate hain vah haragiz hamase posheeda nahin hain bhala jo shakhs dozakh mein daala jaega vah behatar hai ya vah shakhs jo qayaamat ke din bekhauph va khatar aaega (khair) jo chaaho so karo (magar) jo kuchh tum karate ho vah (khuda) usako dekh raha hai
